title: Signal
summary: A signal draws attention to notifications and new content.

overview.title: Usage
overview.section-content: The signal is mainly used on buttons and menu buttons. The signal's style matches the button's rank and variant by default.

columns.content: On the intranet we use the signal on the “What's new?”-button to indicate a new function or feauture has been released. The button will trigger a popover with more information about what is new.

columns.caption: A floating action button with the signal as trailing element.
